Tug TSWV, yeej tsi muaj lwm tug zoo npaum le koj; peb tsuas paub koj tuab leeg xwb txhaj yog Vaajtswv.

Tsi muaj ib tsaav tuabneeg twg nyob huv nplajteb nuav zoo npaum le koj tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees, cov kws koj tau cawm dlim ntawm txujkev ua qhev lug ua koj tsaav tuabneeg. Yaam tseemceeb hab zoo tshaaj plawg kws koj tau ua rua puab nuav nrov nchaa moog thoob plawg huv nplajteb nuav lawm. Koj tau cawm koj tsaav tuabneeg dlim nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, hab muab lwm tsaav tuabneeg ntab tawm taabmeeg koj tsaav tuabneeg.
Koj tau xaiv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees lug ua koj tsaav tuabneeg moog ibtxhis, hab koj yog tug TSWV, koj yeej yog puab tug Vaajtswv tag.
“Tug TSWV, nwgnuav thov kuas tej lug kws koj cog tseg rua koj tug tubkhai hab nwg cov xeebntxwv nyob moog ibtxhis, hab thov ua kuas tav lawv le koj tau has tseg lawm.

Koj lub koob lub npe yuav nrov nchaa moo lug, hab noobneej yuav qhuas koj moog ibtxhis has tas, ‘Tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus yog tug Vaajtswv kws kaav cov Yixalayees.’ Hab koj yuav pub kuas koj tug tubkhai Daviv caajceg nyob ruaj khov ntawm koj xubndlag moog ibtxhis.
Kuv tug Vaajtswv, vim koj tau qha txhua yaam nuav rua kuv kws yog koj tug tubkhai, hab koj tau has tas, koj yuav tsaa kuv cov xeebntxwv lug ua vaajntxwv, kuv txhaj muaj lub sab kub lug thov koj.
Tug TSWV, koj yeej yog Vaajtswv tag, hab koj tau coglug zoo kawg nkaus rua kuv kws yog koj tug tubkhai.

Kuv thov koj foom koob moov rua kuv cov xeebntxwv kuas puab muaj lub sab npuab koj moog ibtxhis. Tug TSWV, tej koob moov kws koj foom rua puab hab koj tej koob moov ntawd yuav nrug puab nyob moog ibtxhis tsi kawg le.”

Tau ib ntus tom qaab nuav, Vaajntxwv Daviv moog ua rog rua cov Filitees dlua ib zag ntxiv hab nwg tua yeej puab. Nwg txhaj txeeb tau lub nroog Nkas hab tej zog kws nyob ibncig lub nroog luj ntawm cov Filitees teg lug.
Hab nwg tseem moog tua yeej cov Mau-am huv tuabsi, cov tuabneeg Mau-am txhaj tau ua nwg qhev hab them se rua nwg.

Daviv tseem moog tua yeej cov Xilias tug Vaajntxwv Hadadexes kws kaav lub xeev Xaunpas kws nyob ze rua ntawm cheebtsaam Hamas, rua qhov Hadadexes xaav ua tug kaav taagnrho cheebtsaam ntawm tug dlej Efalates saab peg.

Daviv nteg tau Hadadexes ib txheeb lub tsheb neeg ua rog, xyaa txheeb leej tubrog caij neeg, hab neeg nkaum txheeb leej tubrog moog kutaw. Nwg muab cov neeg ntawd ibtxha txu leeg rawg, nwg tsuas tseg kuas txaus nkaus hai ib puas lub tsheb xwb.

Thaus cov Xilias kws nyob huv lub nroog Damaxes xaa ib cov tubrog tuaj paab Vaajntxwv Hadadexes huv lub nroog Xaunpas, tabsis paab tubrog ntawd raug Daviv puab muab tua tuag lawm neeg nkaum ob txheeb leej.

Ces Daviv txhaj moog tsuam yeej rua huv cov Xilias lub nroog Damaxes hab cov Xilias tau ua Daviv qhev hab them se rua nwg. Tug TSWV pub rua Daviv tua yeej rog txhua qhov chaw kws Daviv moog txug huv tuabsi.
Daviv tseem txeeb tau Hadadexes cov tubrog tej thaiv nav ntaaj kws muab kub ua hab muab nqaa huv tuabsi lug rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees lawm.

Daviv tseem coj tau tej tooj dlaag ntau heev huv lub nroog Tinpehas hab lub nroog Kunes kws Hadadexes kaav lug. (Tom qaab nuav Xalumoos txhaj muab cov tooj dlaag ntawd lug ua lub rhawv dlej, ob tug ncej hab tej twj taig kws siv huv lub Tuamtsev.)
Thaus Vaajntxwv Tau-is kws kaav lub nroog Hamas nov has tas, Daviv moog tua yeej taagnrho Hadadexes cov tubrog lawm.

Nwg txhaj tso nwg tug tub Yaulaas moog hawm Vaajntxwv Daviv, hab qhuas tej kws Daviv tua yeej Vaajntxwv Hadadexes, tug kws kaav lub xeev Xaunpas kws tau ua rog ntau zag rua Tau-is lug lawm. Yaulaas txhaj coj kub, nyaj hab tooj ntau heev tuaj pub rua Daviv.
Vaajntxwv Daviv muab tej nyaj, tej kub kws nwg moog tua yeej cov Edoos, cov Mau-am, cov Filitees hab cov Amalej kws nwg nqaa lug ntawd coj tuaj fij rua Vaajtswv.
Anpisais kws nwg nam hu ua Xeluyas, tau moog tua yeej cov Edoos kws nyob huv lub Haav Ntsev, hab muab puab tua tuag taag lawm kaum yim txheeb leej.

Nwg txhaj ua tau ib lub yeej rua nwg cov tubrog nyob huv tebchaws Edoos; hab taagnrho cov tuabneeg Edoos puavleej tau ua Daviv qhev. Tug TSWV pub rua Daviv tua yeej rog txhua qhov chaw kws Daviv moog txug huv tuabsi.
Daviv kaav taagnrho cov Yixalayees; hab nwg muaj kev tswjfwm ncaaj nceeg rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg.
Xeluyas tug tub Yau-am kws yog Anpisais tug tijlaug ua tug thawj tubrog; Ahilus tug tub Yehausafas ua tug teev ntawv;
Ahitus tug tub Xadaus hab Ahimelej tug tub Anpiyathas, ua ob tug povthawj; hab Xelayas  ua tug teev ntawv;
Yehauyadas tug tub Npenayas ua tug thawj saib cov tubrog kws zuv Daviv; hab Vaajntxwv Daviv cov tub puavleej yog cov numtswv qeb sab ntawm Daviv xubndlag.
Tom qaab kws Vaajntxwv Nahases kws kaav cov Amoos tuag lawm, nwg tug tub Hanoos ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.

Vaajntxwv Daviv has tas, “Kuv yuav tau muab sab npuab hab ua phoojywg zoo rua Nahases tug tub Hanoos, vim nwg txiv Nahases tau ua phoojywg zoo heev rua kuv lug lawm.” Yog le ntawd, Daviv txhaj tso ib cov tuabneeg moog nplig nwg sab, vim hlub tshua txug nwg txiv. Thaus Daviv cov tuabneeg moog txug huv tebchaws Amoos, puab txawm moog cuag Vaajntxwv Hanoos hab nplig nwg sab,

tabsis cov Amoos tej thawjcoj txawm has rua Vaajntxwv Hanoos has tas, “Koj xaav has tas Daviv tso cov tuabneeg nuav tuaj nplig koj sab, vim nwg fwm koj txiv nuav los? Tsi yog le ntawd! Nwg tso puab tuaj soj saib thoob plawg lub tebchaws nuav, kuas nwg txhaj tuaj tua yeej lub tebchaws nuav xwb!”
Hanoos txhaj muab Daviv cov tuabneeg chais fwjtxwv, muab puab tej tsho ntev txav txug ndlua ntawm pobtw, hab nwg muab puab ntab rov lug.

Puab txaj muag heev rov qaab lug tsev. Thaus Daviv nov tej xwmtxheej nuav, nwg txhaj khaiv tuabneeg moog has rua puab tas, “Mej lug nyob tuabywv huv lub nroog Yelikaus moog txug thaus mej tej fwjtxwv tuaj ntev le qub lawm, mej maam lug tsev.”

Ces Vaajntxwv Hanoos hab cov Amoos paub has tas, puab ua rua Daviv chim lawm mas Daviv yuav ua yeebncuab rua puab. Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj muab yuav laug plaub taas nyaj moog ndlav tau ib cov tsheb neeg hab tubrog tsaav tsheb neeg, peg tebchaws Mexuputamias hab cov Xilias kws nyob huv lub xeev Ma-akas hab Xaunpas tuaj.

Mas peb caug ob txheeb lub tsheb neeg kws puab ndlav, hab cov Ma-akas tug vaajntxwv nrug nwg cov tubrog tuaj tsuam yeej ze rua ntawm Medenpas. Hab cov Amoos moog tsuam yeej thoob plawg rua huv puab tej nroog npaaj nroog tog sis tua lawm xwb.
Thaus Daviv nov tej xwmtxheej nuav, nwg txawm tso Yau-am hab taagnrho cov tubrog kws muaj zug heev tawm moog.

Cov Amoos txawm tawm tuaj nyob puv nkaus rua ntawm puab tej chaw sis tua kws yuav moog rua huv lub nroog Lanpas kws yog puab lub tuamceeb nroog, hab cov vaajntxwv kws tuaj paab puab los tuaj nyob taagnrho rua ntawm tej roob mojsaab.

Yau-am pum cov yeebncuab tej tubrog kws tuaj tua nwg sawv nplawg nta tom hauv ntej hab tom qaab. Yog le ntawd nwg txhaj xaiv cov tubrog Yixalayees kws txawj tua rog heev, hab tso puab moog nyob txum chaw tim ntsej tim muag cov Xilias.
Nwg muab nwg cov tubrog kws seem rua nwg tug kwv Anpisais ua tug coj, Anpisais coj puab moog nyob txum chaw tim ntsej tim muag cov Amoos.
Yau-am has rua nwg tug kwv tas, “Yog thaus twg koj pum cov Xilias tua yeej kuv, ces koj ca le lug paab kuv, hab yog cov Amoos tua yeej koj, ces kuv lug paab koj.
Cuab zug khov kho hab ua sab tawv qhawv xwb! Ca le nqeg teg tua tag tag pub rua peb cov tuabneeg hab peb tug Vaajtswv lub nroog. Hab thov kuas tug TSWV ua lawv le nwg pum zoo.”
Yog le ntawd, Yau-am hab nwg cov tuabneeg txhaj naam zog moog tua cov Xilias, ces cov Xilias ca le tawg tsiv ri sua lawm.

Thaus cov Amoos pum cov Xilias tawg tsiv ri sua, ces puab txawm tsiv tsi tiv tua Anpisais puab, hab tsiv rov qaab moog rua huv nroog taag le lawm. Ces Yau-am puab txawm rov lug rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.

Tabsis thaus cov Xilias pum has tas, puab tua tsi yeej cov Yixalayees lawm, puab txhaj tso tuabneeg moog coj cov tubrog Xilias kws nyob huv lub xeev ntawm tug dlej Efalates saab nubtuaj, hab coj puab tuaj cob rua Saunpas kws yog Vaajntxwv Hadadexes kws kaav lub xeev Xaunpas tug thawj tubrog saib.

Thaus Daviv nov tej nuav, nwg txawm txhij cov tubrog Yixalayees moog sis sau ua ke hab hlaa tug dlej Yauladees rua saab tim u, hab puab moog nyob txum chaw tim ntsej tim muag cov Xilias. Ces puab txawm nqeg teg sis tua,

hab cov Yixalayees muab cov Xilias tej tubrog caum tawg ri sua rov qaab lawm. Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg tua cov tubrog Xilias tsaav tsheb neeg tuag lawm xyaa txheeb leej hab cov tubrog moog kutaw tuag lawm plaub caug txheeb leej. Hab puab tseem tua tau cov Xilias tug thawj tubrog Saunpas lawm hab.
Thaus cov vaajntxwv kws tuaj Hadadexes tog paub tas puab swb cov Yixalayees lawm, puab txawm cog phoojywg nrug Daviv, hab zoo sab ca Daviv ua tug tswjfwm puab.
Yog le ntawd, cov Xilias txhaj tu sab nrho tsi kaam paab cov Amoos ib zag ntxiv le lawm.

Thaus txug lub caij nplooj ntoos hlaav kws yog lub sijhawm cov Vaajntxwv pheej tawm moog tua rog, Yau-am txawm coj cov tubrog tawm moog tua cov Amoos lub tebchaws, hab lug puav lub nroog Lanpas. Tabsis Vaajntxwv Daviv tseem nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees. Puab moog puav lub nroog Lanpas, hab muab lub nroog ntawd tua puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi lawm.

Cov Amoos tug mlom Maules  muaj ib lub mom kub nyaav kwvyees le xyaa caum tsib choj. Muaj ib lub hlaws dlai rua sau lub mom ntawd, Daviv txhaj dlaws lub hlaws ntawd lug dlai rua sau nwg lub mom kub. Hab nwg tseem nqaa tej khoom kws puab fuab tau huv lub nroog ntawd ntau heev lug hab.

Daviv coj cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog ntawd lug, hab nwg muab kaw, muab hlau hab muab taus rua puab, yuam kuas puab moog ua num. Daviv ua le nuav rua cov Amoos txhua lub nroog. Ces Daviv hab nwg cov tubrog txawm rov lug tsev rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees lawm.

Tau tsi ntev lug tom qaab nuav, rov muaj kev ua rog nrug cov Filitees ib zag ntxiv ntawm lub nroog Nkexes; ces Xinpekhais kws nyob huv nroog Husas txhaj tua tau Xipais kws yog caajceg ntawm cov tuabneeg luj heev ntawd; txhaj ua rua cov tuabneeg Filitees swb hlo lawm.

Tom qaab nuav rov qaab ua rog nrug cov Filitees dlua ib zag ntxiv, ces Yais tug tub Ehanas txhaj tua tau Lamis kws yog Nkauli-am tug kwv kws tuaj huv lub nroog Khas tuaj tuag kag, Lamis muaj ib tug muv lub vug dlaav ib yaam le lub nqog ntus ntaub.

Dlhau ntawd lug rov ua rog dlua ib zag ntxiv nyob ntawm lub nroog Nkas. Nyob rua huv muaj ib tug tuabneeg luj heev, nwg ib saab teg twg muaj rau tug ntivteg hab ib saab kutaw twg muaj rau tug ntivtaw. Hab nwg yog caajceg ntawm cov tuabneeg kws luj heev.
Nwg tau tuam mom cov Yixalayees, ces Daviv tug tijlaug Samas tug tub Yaunathaas txhaj muab nwg tua tuag lawm.
Peb tug tuabneeg kws raug Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg tua tuag ntawd, puavleej yog xeebntxwv ntawm cov tuabneeg luj kws ibtxwm nyob huv lub nroog Nkas.
Ntxwgnyoog nrhav kev tawmtsaam cov Yixalayees, yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj tshoov Daviv sab kuas suav cov Yixalayees.

Daviv txhaj has rua Yau-am hab cov thawj tubrog tas, “Mej moog suav cov tuabneeg Yixalayees kws nyob thoob plawg huv lub tebchaws, pib kag ntawm lub nroog Npesenpas moog txug ndlua peg lub nroog Daas, hab rov lug qha rua kuv paub saib puab muaj npaum le caag tag.”

Yau-am txhaj teb has tas, “Thov kuas nwgnuav tug TSWV ua rua cov tuabneeg Yixalayees muaj coob tshaaj le ib puas npaug ntxiv! Kuv tug vaajntxwv, cov pejxeem nuav puavleej yog koj cov tubkhai xwb! Vim le caag koj xaav kuas ua tej nuav hab ua rua suavdlawg muaj txim?”
Tabsis vaajntxwv yuam kuas Yau-am ca le ua le nwg tej lug saamfwm xwb. Yog le ntawd, Yau-am txhaj le moog ncig thoob plawg lub tebchaws Yixalayees, nwg rov lug rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.

Nwg txhaj lug tshaab xu rua Vaajntxwv Daviv has tas, cov Yixalayees muaj ib plhom ib puas txheeb leej, yog cov txivneej kws muaj zug khov kho hab ua taug tubrog; cov Yudas muaj plaub puas xyaa caum txheeb leej.
Vim Yau-am tsi pum zoo ua lawv le vaajntxwv tej lug saamfwm, nwg txhaj tsi tau moog suav xeem Levis hab xeem Npeenyamees.
Vaajtswv tsi txaus sab rua tej num kws puab ua taag lug ntawd, nwg txhaj rau txim rua cov Yixalayees.
Daviv txhaj thov Vaajtswv has tas, “Kuv yeej tau ua txhum luj heev lawm tag lauj! Thov zaam txim rua kuv kws yog koj tug tubkhai. Kuv tau ua tej num kws ruag kawg nkaus le.”
Ces tug TSWV has rua Nkas kws yog Daviv tug cevlug tas,
“Koj ca le moog qha rua Daviv has tas, ‘Kuv yuav muab peb yaam rua nwg xaiv. Nwg xaiv yaam twg kuv yuav muab yaam ntawd rua nwg.’ ”
Yog le ntawd, Nkas txhaj moog cuag Daviv hab pav tej kws tug TSWV has rua nwg lawm rua Daviv noog, hab nug Daviv has tas, “Xaiv saib koj yuav yaam twg?

Raug kev tshaib plaab peb xyoos? Lossis tsiv koj cov yeebncuab tej tubrog peb hlis? Lossis ca tug TSWV muab nwg raab ntaaj lug tua koj peb nub hab tso sub tawg sub ntshaa lug rua koj lub tebchaws kws yog ca nwg tug timtswv coj kev tuag lug raug thoob plawg lub tebchaws Yixalayees? Koj yuav teb le caag rua kuv coj moog has rua tug TSWV?”

Daviv teb Nkas has tas, “Kuv nyob rua lub tsaamthawj kws taag kev ca sab lawm; kuv tsi xaav ca tuabneeg txhais teg rau txim rua kuv; tabsis kuv thov ca tug TSWV txhais teg rau txim rua kuv xwb, vim Vaajtswv yog tug kws muaj kev hlub luj heev.”
Yog le ntawd, tug TSWV txhaj tso tej kaab mob kws yog sub tawg sub ntshaa lug rua cov Yixalayees, puab txhaj tuag lawm xyaa caum txheeb leej.

Hab Vaajtswv tso nwg tug timtswv lug rhuav lub nroog Yeluxalees, tabsis thaus nwg taabtom yuav pib rhuav lub nroog Yeluxalees kuas puamtsuaj; tug TSWV txawm hloov sab hab has rua tug timtswv tas, “Tsum! Yuav le ko xwb, txaus lawm!” Tug timtswv taabtom lug sawv ncaaj ntawm Alaunas kws yog ib tug tuabneeg Yenpus lub tshaav ntaus nplej.

Daviv tsaa qhovmuag saib sau nruab ntug hab pum tug TSWV tug timtswv ntawd nyob sau, nwg txhais teg tuav rawv ib raab ntaaj taw tuaj rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees. Ces Daviv hab cov thawjcoj txhaj muab tej rig tsho ntaub tsaaj lug naav hab txhus caug ndlua pe ua ntsejmuag ti nkaus rua huv aav.

Daviv thov Vaajtswv has tas, “Vaajtswv, kuv tuab leeg yog tug kws ua txhum xwb. Kuv tuab leeg yog tug kws kuas suav tuabneeg. Cov tuabneeg txomnyem nuav tau ua txhum dlaabtsi? Tug TSWV kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, koj ca le rau txim rua kuv hab kuv tsev tuabneeg xwb, tsi xob rau txim rua koj tsaav tuabneeg!”
Tug TSWV tug timtswv has rua Nkas kuas saamfwm rua Daviv, ca le moog ua ib lub thaaj rua tug TSWV rua ntawm Alaunas lub tshaav ntaus nplej.
Yog le ntawd, Daviv noog tug TSWV lug, hab nwg moog ua lawv le kws Nkas has kuas nwg ua ntawd.
Alaunas hab nwg plaub tug tub tseem taabtom ntaus nplej huv lub tshaav nplej, thaus puab pum dlheev tug timtswv, nwg cov tub txhaj tsiv moog nkaum lawm.
Taamsim ntawd Alaunas txawm pum dlheev Vaajntxwv Daviv tuaj txug ndlua, nwg txhaj tso plhuav tsi ntaus nplej hab moog nyo ntshis pe ua ntsejmuag ti nkaus rua huv aav.

Daviv has rua Alaunas tas, “Thov muab koj lub tshaav ntaus nplej muag rua kuv, kuv yuav muab qhov chaw nuav ua ib lub thaaj rua tug TSWV, kuas tej sub tawg sub ntshaa txhaj tsi lug raug cov pejxeem ntxiv lawm. Kuv yuav muab nqe kuas txaus nkaus rua koj.”

Alaunas teb has tas, “Kuv tug Vaajntxwv koj ca le yuav, hab ua txhua yaam lawv le koj pum zoo ntaag. Cov nuav yog cov txiv nyuj kws koj yuav tua hlawv fij rua sau lub thaaj, hab tej nuav yog cov txag ntaus nplej kws koj siv ua tawg rauv, ca le muab kuv tej nplej fij rua tug TSWV. Kuv muab taagnrho tej nuav pub rua koj.”

Tabsis Vaajntxwv Daviv teb Alaunas has tas, “Tsi xob ua le ntawd, kuv yuav them nqe kuas txaus rua koj. Kuv tsi muab ib yaam kws tseem yog koj tug fij rua tug TSWV, yog has tas kuv tsi tau them nqe rua yaam ntawd.”
Ces Daviv muab tau rau pua lub txaj kub them Alaunas lub tshaav ntaus nplej.

Daviv ua tau ib lub thaaj rua tug TSWV nyob qhov ntawd, nwg muab tsaj tua hlawv fij hab fij khoom ua kev sis raug zoo rua tug TSWV. Daviv thov hab tug TSWV teb Daviv tej lug thov nwg txhaj tso suavtawg poob sau ntuj lug kub tej khoom fij sau lub thaaj huv tuabsi lawm.
Tug TSWV has rua tug timtswv kuas muab nwg raab ntaaj ntsaws rov rua huv naab, tug timtswv noog tug TSWV lug hab ua lawv le tug TSWV has.
Thaus lub sijhawm ntawd, Daviv pum tug TSWV teb nwg ntawm Alaunas lub tshaav ntaus nplej, Daviv txhaj fij khoom nyob ntawm Alaunas lub tshaav ntaus nplej.

Vim thaus ntawd, tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib kws Mauxes ua tom taj suabpuam, hab lub thaaj kws hlawv tej khoom theej txhoj ntawd nyob rua huv qhov chaw pehawm Vaajtswv huv lub nroog Nkinpe-oos lawm;
Tabsis Daviv tsi muaj peevxwm yuav moog pehawm Vaajtswv tod le, vim nwg ntshai tug timtswv ntawd raab ntaaj heev.
Ces Daviv has tas, “Ntawm nuav yog qhov chaw kws yuav ua tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv lub Tuamtsev rua. Ntawm nuav yog lub thaaj kws cov Yixalayees tuaj hlawv tej khoom fij rua sau ntaag.”
Vaajntxwv Daviv has rua cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nyob huv tebchaws Yixalayees kuas tuaj sis sau ua ke, nwg yuav faib num rua puab ua. Ibtxha moog txaug pobzeb lug ua lub Tuamtsev.
Daviv npaaj hlau ntau heev tseg rua puab ntaus ua ntsa hlau hab ntaus ua tej pluaj hlau yuam cov txag ntoo ua dlaim kaw roojvaag, hab muab tooj ntau heev tsi muaj leejtwg luj tau le.
Tseem muaj cov tuabneeg Tiles hab cov tuabneeg Xidoos txav ntoo cab tuaj rua Daviv ntau kawg le hab.

Daviv xaav has tas, “Lub Tuamtsev kws kuv tug tub Xalumoos yuav ua rua tug TSWV ntawd, yuav zoo nkauj heev hab nto moo heev nyob huv lub nplajteb nuav. Tabsis kuv tug tub tseem hluas heev hab tsi tau paub hlo le.” Yog le ntawd kuv yuavtsum npaaj tej khoom kws ua lub Tuamtsev nuav kuas txhij rua nwg.
Daviv has rua nwg tug tub Xalumoos hab saamfwm kuas nwg yuavtsum ua lub tuamtsev rua tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv.
Daviv has rua Xalumoos has tas, “Mivtub, kuv xaav ua ib lub tuamtsev lug ua chaw qhuas tug TSWV kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv.

Tabsis tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, ‘Koj tau ua rog ntau zag lug lawm hab tau tua tuabneeg coob tug tuag lawm; koj yuav tsi tau ua lub Tuamtsev rua kuv, vim koj tau tua tuabneeg coob tug tuag taabmeeg kuv.

Koj yuav muaj ib tug tub; nwg yuav kaav lub tebchaws nyob thaajyeeb lug. Kuv yuav pub nwg muaj kev thaajyeeb, nwg cov yeebncuab yuav tsi tuaj tua nwg, nwg lub npe yuav hu ua Xalumoos,  hab kuv yuav pub rua nwg tam, kuas lub tebchaws Yixalayees muaj kev thaajyeeb hab nyob ntsag tu.
Nwg yuav ua lub Tuamtsev rua kuv lub npe. Nwg yuav ua kuv tug tub, hab kuv yuav ua nwg txiv. Nwg caajceg yuav ua vaajntxwv kaav tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees moog ibtxhis.’ ”

Daviv rov has dlua ib zag ntxiv tas: “Mivtub, nwgnuav thov tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv nrug nraim koj, hab thov nwg ua lawv le nwg tej lug cog tseg, kuas koj muaj peevxwm ua tau lub Tuamtsev rua nwg.
Hab thov tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv pub kev txawj ntse hab tswvyim rua koj, kuas koj txhaj txawj tswjfwm tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees lawv le nwg txuj kevcai.

Yog koj coj lawv le tej kevcai kws tug TSWV muab cob rua Mauxes kuas qha rua cov Yixalayees, koj lub neej txhaj yuav muaj kev vaammeej. Ca le npaaj khov kho hab ua sab tawv qhawv, hab tsi xob ntshai ib yaam dlaabtsi le.

Kuv muaj lub sab kub lug yuav ua lub Tuamtsev, kuv tub muab tau le plaub taas kub hab plaub caug taas nyaj coj lug ca ua lub Tuamtsev ntawd lawm; tej tooj hab hlau kws kuv npaaj los kuj ntau heev suav tsi txheeb le. Dlua le ntawd, kuv tub npaaj ntoo hab pobzeb tav log tseg lawm, tabsis koj yuavtsum npaaj ntxiv hab.
Koj muaj cov tuabneeg kws txawj ua num coob heev: cov kws txawj txaug pobzeb, ntaus hlau, txua ntoo hab cov kws txawj ua txhua yaam coob heev suav tsi txheeb, puab puavleej txawj
nchuav kub, nchuav nyaj, nchuav tooj hab ntaus hlau. Ca le nqeg teg ua. Thov tug TSWV nrug nraim koj.”
Daviv saamfwm rua cov Yixalayees cov thawjcoj kuas tuaj paab nwg tug tub Xalumoos.

Nwg has tas, “Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav nrug mej hab nwg pub kuas muaj kev thaajyeeb nyob puagncig mej. Nwg tub pub rua kuv tua yeej cov tuabneeg kws ibtxwm nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav, hab puab tub tau lug ua mej qhev hab ua tug TSWV qhev lawm.

Nwgnuav mej ca le txhawb nqaa tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv kuas kawg mej lub sab lub ntsws. Ca le pib ua lub Tuamtsev, mej txhaj yuav muaj qhov chaw lug rau lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg hab coj Vaajtswv tej khoom tseemceeb moog tso rua huv lub Tuamtsev kws ua pub rua tug TSWV lub npe.”
Thaus Daviv laug heev lawm, nwg txhaj tsaa nwg tug tub Xalumoos ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees.
Vaajntxwv Daviv coj cov tuabneeg Yixalayees cov thawjcoj, cov povthawj hab cov Levis tuaj sis sau ua ke.
Suav taagnrho cov Levis kws noobnyoog muaj peb caug xyoo rov sau, cov txivneej muaj peb caug yim txheeb leej.
Daviv has tas, “Tsaa neeg nkaum plaub txheeb leej, ua num huv tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev hab tsaa rau txheeb leej ua cov numtswv tu plaub ntug;
tsaa plaub txheeb leej ua cov zuv roojvaag, plaub txheeb leej ua cov tshuab raaj hab ntaus nkauj nogncaas kws kuv npaaj tseg ca lawm ua tug TSWV tsaug.”
Daviv muab puab faib ua tej paab lawv le Levis cov tub: Nkesoos, Kauhas hab Melalis.
Nkesoos muaj ob tug tub: Ladas hab Sime-is.
Ladas muaj peb tug tub: Yehiyees, Xethamas hab Yau-ees,
Sime-is muaj peb tug tub: Selaumaus, Haxiyees hab Halaas.  Puab puavleej yog cov thawjcoj ntawm Ladas caajceg.
Hab Sime-is muaj plaub tug tub: Yahaj, Xinas, Ye-uses hab Npeliyas. Plaub leeg nuav puavleej yog Sime-is tub.
Yahaj yog tug thawjcoj, hab Xixas yog tug lwm thawj; tabsis Ye-uses hab Npeliyas tsi muaj tub coob pistsawg, vim le ntawd txhaj muab obtug suav ua ib cuab kwvtij lawm xwb.
Kauhas muaj plaub tug tub: Amalas, Ixahas, Henploos, hab Uxiyees.

Kauhas tug tub hlub, Amalas yog Aloos hab Mauxes obtug txiv. (Muab Aloos hab nwg cov xeebntxwv ua cov saib tej khoom tseemceeb, hlawv tej tshuaj tsw qaab huv chaav pehawm tug TSWV ua tug TSWV teg num hab tuav tug TSWV lub npe foom koob moov rua suavdlawg.
Tabsis Mauxes kws yog Vaajtswv tug tuabneeg cov tub, puavleej muab suav nrug cov Levis lawm.)
Mauxes muaj ob tug tub: Nkesoos hab Eli-exes.
Senpuyees ua Nkesoos cov tub tug thawjcoj.
Eli-exes tsuas muaj tuab tug tub kws hu ua Lehanpiyas xwb, tabsis Lehanpiyas muaj tub coob kawg le.
Ixahas kws yog Kauhas tug tub ob, muaj ib tug tub hu ua Selaumis, yog tug thawjcoj ntawm nwg cuab kwvtij.
Henploos kws yog Kauhas tug tub peb, muaj plaub tug tub: Yeliyas, Amaliyas, Yehaxiyees hab Yekame-as.
Uxiyees cov tub: Minkas yog tug thawjcoj hab Isiyas yog tug lwm thawj.
Melalis muaj ob tug tub: Mahalis hab Musis. Mahalis los muaj ob tug tub hab xwb: Ele-axas hab Kises,
tabsis Ele-xas tuag thaus nwg tsi tau muaj tub lawm, nwg muaj ib paab ntxhais xwb. Nwg cov ntxhais txhaj moog yuav puab cov nug kwvtij kws yog Kises cov tub.
Melalis tug tub ob kws hu ua Musis, muaj peb tug tub: Mahalis, Edeles hab Yelemaus.

Cov nuav puavleej yog Levis cov xeebntxwv lug ntawm puab tej cuab kwvtij hab tej tsev tuabneeg, puab txhua tug puavleej tuaj sau npe lawv le puab tej caajceg. Levis cov xeebntxwv txhua tug kws noobnyoog muaj neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau, puavleej muab tsaa ua num nyob huv tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev.
Daviv has tas, “Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv tau muab txujkev thaajyeeb pub rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg, hab nwg yuav nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees moog ibtxhis.
Cov Levis yuav tsi tau kwv tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub hab tej khoom siv pehawm Vaajtswv ntxiv lawm.”
Vim Daviv tej lug saamfwm thaus kawg, puab txhaj sau cov Levis kws noobnyoog muaj neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau npe ua cov kws ua Vaajtswv teg num;

hab tsaa puab ua tej num nuav: paab cov povthawj kws yog Aloos cov xeebntxwv ua num nyob huv tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev, ua cov saib cov tshaav puam, cov chaav huv lub Tuamtsev, hab ceev txhua yaam khoom tseemceeb huv Vaajtswv lub Tuamtsev;

ua cov paab saib tej ncuav kws coj tuaj tso rua sau rooj fij rua Vaajtswv, tej moov nplej kws coj tuaj ua khoom fij, tej ncuav tsi xyaw keeb, tej mov kws cub ua khoom fij, tej moov nplej kws zuaj xyaw roj txiv ntoo; tej khoom kws muab luj hab yeem tuaj fij huv lub Tuamtsev;
hab txhua taagkig puab yuavtsum sawv ntxuv moog qhuas hab ua Vaajtswv tsaug, thaus yaav tsaus ntuj los puab ua ib yaam nkaus,

hab txhua zag kws hlawv khoom fij rua tug TSWV, tsi has nub Xanpataus, thaus hli xab hab lwm yaam kevcai, los puab yuavtsum ua kuas lawv le tej kevcai kws tub teev tseg lawm pub rua tug TSWV moog ibtxhis le.

Puab lub luag num yog ua cov saib hab tu tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib hab lub Tuamtsev, hab paab puab cov kwvtij kws yog Aloos cov xeebntxwv kws ua povthawj, huv lub Tuamtsev qhov chaw pehawm Vaajtswv.
Aloos cov xeebntxwv yog muaj lawv le nraag nuav. Aloos muaj plaub tug tub: Nadas, Anpihus, Ele-axas hab Ithamas.
Nadas hab Anpihus xub tuag ua ntej dlua obtug txiv, hab obtug tsi muaj ib tug mivnyuas le, yog le ntawd, obtug ob tug kwv kws yog Ele-xas hab Ithamas txhaj tau lug ua povthawj.
Vim muaj Xadaus kws yog Ele-axas tug xeebntxwv, hab muaj Ahimelej kws yog Ithamas tug xeebntxwv paab Daviv, nwg txhaj sau tau Aloos cov xeebntxwv lug ua tej paab lawv le puab tej luag num.

Vim cov txivneej kws yog Ele-axas cov xeebntxwv ua thawjcoj coob dlua Ithamas cov xeebntxwv, puab txhaj muab Ele-axas cov xeebntxwv faib ua kaum rau paab, hab muab Ithamas cov xeebntxwv faib ua yim paab.
Ele-axas hab Ithamas obtug cov xeebntxwv kws ua thawj huv lub Tuamtsev hab coj saab ntsujplig, puab rhu ntawv saib tau teg num twg ua.

Ele-xas hab Ithamas cov xeebntxwv tuaj moog rhu ntawv ib tug dlhau rua ib tug. Puab tuaj sau npe rua ntawm Nethanees tug tub Semayas kws yog ib tug Levis. Muaj vaajntxwv hab nwg cov numtswv, tug povthawj Xadaus, Ahimelej tug tub Anpiyathas, cov thawjcoj ntawm cov povthawj hab cov Levis caajceg ua timkhawv.
Rhu ntawv thawj zag tau rua Yehauyalis, rhu zag ob tau rua Yedayas,
zag peb tau rua Halees, zag plaub tau rua Xe-aulees,
zag tsib tau rua Makhiyas, zag rau tau rua Miyamees,
zag xyaa tau rua Hakauxes, zag yim tau rua Anpiyas,
zag cuaj tau rua Yesuas, zag kaum tau rua Sekaniyas,
zag kaum ib tau rua Eli-asis, zag kaum ob tau rua Yakees,
zag kaum peb tau rua Hupas, zag kaum plaub tau rua Yesenpe-as,
zag kaum tsib tau rua Npilenkas, zag kaum rau tau rua Imeles,
zag kaum xyaa tau rua Hexiles, zag kaum yim tau rua Hapixes,
zag kaum cuaj tau rua Pethahiyas, zag neeg nkaum tau rua Yehexekees,
zag neeg nkaum ib tau rua Yakhees, zag neeg nkaum ob tau rua Nkamules,
zag neeg nkaum peb tau rua Delayas hab zag neeg nkaum plaub tau rua Ma-axiyas.

Cov tuabneeg nuav nyag muaj nyag teg num ua huv tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev lawv le puab yawmkoob Aloos tub muab cob rua puab hab lawv le tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv tau saamfwm tseg rua nwg lawm.
Levis cov xeebntxwv lwm paab muaj lawv le nuav: Yedeyas, yog Amelas ib tug xeebntxwv kws yog Senpuyees caajceg;
Isiyas yog tug thawjcoj, nwg yog Lehanpiyas tug xeebntxwv;
Yahaj, yog Ixehas ib tug xeebntxwv kws yog Selaumaus caajceg.
Yeliyas Amaliyas, Yehaxiyees hab Yekamees yog Henploos cov tub lawv le puab tej noobnyoog;
Samiles, yog Uxiyees ib tug xeebntxwv kws yog Mikas caajceg;
Xakhaliyas yog Uxiyees ib tug xeebntxwv kws yog Mikas tug kwv Isiyas caajceg;
Mahelis, Musis hab Yaxiyas yog Melalis cov xeebntxwv.
Yaxiyas muaj peb tug tub: Sauhas, Xakules hab Inpelis.
Mahelis tug tub: Ele-axas tsi muaj tub le;
tabsis Mahelis tug tub Kises muaj ib tug tub hu ua Yelamees.
Musis muaj peb tug tub: Mahelis, Edeles hab Yelemaus. Cov nuav puavleej yog Levis caajceg lawv le puab cov yawmkoob.

Txhua tug thawj ntawm txhua tsev tuabneeg hab ntawm nwg tug kwv ntxawg puavleej tau rhu ntawv ib yaam nkaus le puab cov kwvtij kws yog Aloos cov xeebntxwv taabmeeg Vaajntxwv Daviv, Xadaus, Ahimelej hab txhua tug thawjcoj ntawm cov povthawj hab cov Levis.

Vaajntxwv Daviv hab cov thawjcoj ntawm cov Levis xaiv xeem Levis ib cov lug coj kev pehawm Vaajtswv: Axafes, Hemaas hab Yeduthoos. Puab puavleej qha Vaajtswv txujlug nrug tej suab nkauj nogncaas hab tej suab nruag npuaj. Cov kws xaiv lug ua cov coj kev pehawm Vaajtswv lawv le teg num ntawm tej paab muaj npe lawv le nuav:
Axafes plaub tug tub kws yog Xakules, Yauxej, Nethaniyas hab Asalelas. Puab puavleej ua num lawv le Axafes kws yog tug qha Vaajtswv txujlug kuas puab ua hab lawv le vaajntxwv saamfwm.

Yeduthoos rau tug tub Nkedaliyas, Xelis, Yesayas, Sime-is, Hasanpiyas hab Matithiyas. Puab puavleej ua num nyob qaab tswjfwm ntawm puab txiv, puab qha Vaajtswv txujlug nrug tej suab raaj hab nkauj nogncaas, hu nkauj qhuas hab ua tug TSWV tsaug.
Hemaas kaum plaub tug tub: Npukiyas, Mataniyas, Uxiyees, Senpuyees, Yelimaus, Hananiyas, Hananis, Eli-athas, Nkidatis, Lumatis Exeles, Yunpekasas, Malauthis, Hauthiles hab Mahaxi-aus.

Vaajtswv pub rua Hemaas kws yog Vaajtswv tug cevlug muaj kaum plaub tug tub hab peb tug ntxhais, lawv le Vaajtswv coglug tseg rua Hemaas has tas, yuav pub kuas Hemaas yog ib tug kws muaj fwjchim heev.

Taagnrho nwg cov tub nuav puavleej yog cov npuaj nruag hab ntaus nkauj nogncaas lawv le puab txiv ua tug coj puab hu nkauj rua huv lub Tuamtsev pehawm Vaajtswv. Axafes, Yeduthoos hab Hemas, puavleej ua lawv le vaajntxwv kuas puab ua.

Puab neeg nkaum plaub leeg nuav hab puab cov kwvtij Levis, puavleej yog cov txawj ntse; hab yog cov kawm hu nkauj lug hu nkauj qhuas tug TSWV nkaus xwb. Taagnrho yog muaj ob puas yim caum yim leej txivneej.
Puab puavleej rhu ntawv txhaj tau puab tej num, tsi has tug laug tug hluas lossis cov kws tub txawj lawm lossis cov kws tseem xyum xwb.
Thawj zag kws rhu rua Axafes tsev tuabneeg yog tau rua Yauxej, nwg cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij; zag ob rhu tau rua Nkedaliyas, nwg cov kwvtij hab puab cov tub kaum ob leeg;
rhu zag peb tau rua Xakules, nwg cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij kaum ob leeg;
rhu zag plaub tau rua Ixelis, nwg cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij kaum ob leeg;
rhu zag tsib tau rua Nethaniyas, nwg cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij kaum ob leeg;
rhu zag rau, tau rua Npukiyas, nwg cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij kaum ob leeg;
rhu zag xyaa tau rua Yexalelas, nwg cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij kaum ob leeg;
rhu zag yim tau rua Yesaiyas, nwg cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij kaum ob leeg;
rhu zag cuaj tau rua Matithiyas, nwg cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij kaum ob leeg;
rhu zag kaum tau rua Sime-is, nwg cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij kaum ob leeg;
rhu zag kaum ib tau rua Uxiyees, nwg cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij kaum ob leeg;
rhu zag kaum ob tau rua Hasanpiyas, nwg cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij kaum ob leeg;
rhu zag kaum peb tau rua Senpuyees, nwg cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij kaum ob leeg;
rhu zag kaum plaub tau rua Matithiyas, nwg cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij kaum ob leeg;
rhu zag kaum tsib tau rua Yelimaus, nwg cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij kaum ob leeg;
rhu zag kaum rau tau rua Hananiyas, nwg cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij kaum ob leeg;
rhu zag kaum xyaa tau rua Yaunpekasas, nwg cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij kaum ob leeg;
rhu zag kaum yim tau rua Hananis, nwg cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij kaum ob leeg;
rhu zag kaum cuaj tau rua Malauthis, nwg cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij kaum ob leeg;
rhu zag neeg nkaum tau rua Eli-athas, nwg cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij kaum ob leeg;
rhu zag neeg nkaum ib tau rua Hauthiles, nwg cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij kaum ob leeg;
rhu zag neeg nkaum ob tau rua Nkidaletis, nwg cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij kaum ob leeg;
rhu zag neeg nkaum peb tau rua Mahaxi-aus, nwg cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij kaum ob leeg;
hab rhu zag neeg nkaum plaub tau rua Laumatis Exeles, nwg cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij kaum ob leeg.
Ntawm nuav yog teg num zuv lub Tuamtsev kws muab cob rua cov Levis: Kauhas caajceg yog Kaules tug tub Meselemiyas kws yog Axafes tug xeebntxwv.
Meselemiyas muaj xyaa tug tub: Xakhaliyas yog tug tub hlub, Yedi-ales yog tug ob, Xenpadiyas yog tug peb, Yathaniyees yog tug plaub,
Elames yog tug tsib, Yehauhanas yog tug rau hab Elihaunais yog tug xyaa.
Vim Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua Aunpes Edoos, nwg txhaj muaj yim tug tub: Semayas yog tug tub hlub, Yehauxanpas yog tug ob, Yau-am yog tug peb, Xakhas yog tug plaub, Nethanees yog tug tsib,
Amiyees yog tug rau, Ixakhas yog tug xyaa hab Pe-ulethais yog tug yim.
Hab Aunpes Edoos tug tub hlub Semayas, kuj muaj ntau tug tub hab puab puavleej ua cov tswjfwm puab txiv tsev tuabneeg, vim puab yog cov kws muaj peevxwm tshaaj plawg le.
Semayas muaj rau tug tub: Authenis, Lefayees, Aunpes, Elexanpas, Elihus hab Xemakhiyas. Paab kwvtij nuav Elihus hab Xemakhiyas sab tawv tshaaj cov huv tuabsi.
Rau caum ob leeg txivneej kws muaj zug khov kho hab muaj peevxwm ua tau teg num nuav mas puavleej yog Aunpes Edoos cov tub hab cov xeebntxwv xwb.
Meselemiyas cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij kws muaj peevxwm heev, yog kaum yim leej.
Hauxas kws yog Melalis caajceg, nwg muaj plaub tug tub: Simelis yog tug thawjcoj, (txawm yog nwg tsi yog tug tub hlub los nwg txiv ca le tsaa nwg ua tug thawjcoj),
Hilekiyas yog tug ob, Tenpaliyas yog tug peb hab Xakhaliyas yog tug plaub; taagnrho Hauxas cov tub hab nwg cov kwvtij muaj kaum peb leeg, puab puavleej moog ua cov zuv lub Tuamtsev.

Muab cov kws zuv tej roojvaag faib ua tej paab, lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg, hab muab lub luag num huv lub Tuamtsev cob rua puab ua, ib yaam le puab cov kwvtij kws tub ua num huv tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev lawm.
Txhua yim tuabneeg, tsi has coob los tsawg, puavleej tau moog rhu ntawv saib tau zuv lub roojvaag twg.
Selemiyas rhu ntawv tau rua lub roojvaag kws nyob saab nubtuaj, hab nwg tug tub Xakhaliyas kws yog ib tug tuavxaam kws muaj tswvyim zoo, rhu ntawv tau rua lub roojvaag kws nyob saab qaumteb.
Aunpes Edoos rhu ntawv tau rua lub roojvaag saab qaabteb, hab nwg cov tub rhu ntawv tau ua cov saib tej txhaab rau khoom.
Supees hab Hauxas obtug rhu ntawv tau rua lub roojvaag saab nubpoob hab lub roojvaag Salekhes kws nyob saab qaum kev. Puab sis faib zuv, nyag zuv muaj nyag sijhawm.

Saab nubtuaj ib nub twg yog rau leej zuv saab qaumteb ib nub twg yog plaub leeg zuv saab qaabteb ib nub twg yog plaub leeg zuv, hab ib nub twg plaub leeg zuv cov txhaab rau khoom, ib lub txhaab twg ob leeg,
hab tog qaab khaav saab nubpoob muaj plaub leeg zuv ntawm txujkev hab ob leeg zuv ntawm qaab khaav.
Tej nuav yog lub luag num kws zuv cov roojvaag hab muab cob rua Kauhas hab Melalis cov xeebntxwv.
Puab lwm paab kwvtij Levis  kws yog cov saib tej txhaab nyaj huv Vaajtswv lub Tuamtsev hab tej txhaab rau tej khoom kws luas coj tuaj fij rua Vaajtswv.
Ladas kws yog Nkesoos ib tug tub, nwg yog yawmkoob ntawm ob peb tsev tuabneeg kws muab faib ua tej paab lawm, hab suav nwg tug tub Yehiyees tsev tuabneeg huv tuabsi nrug.
Yehi-ees ob tug tub, Xethaas hab Yau-ees, ua ob tug kws saib lub txhaab nyaj hab tej txhaab rau khoom huv tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev.
Faib num txhua nrho rua Amelas, Ixehas, Henploos hab Uxis, puab cov xeebntxwv ua.
Senpuyees kws yog Mauxes tug tub Nkesoos tug xeebntxwv, ua tug thawj saib cov numtswv kws zuv lub txhaab nyaj.
Nkesoos tug kwv Eli-exes nwg txheeb Selaumaus. Eli-exes yog Lehanpiyas txiv, Lehanpiyas yog Yesiyas txiv, Yesaiyas yog Yaulaas txiv, Yaulaas yog Xikhalis txiv, Xikhalis yog Selaumis txiv.

Selaumaus hab nwg cov kwvtij ua cov saib taagnrho tej txhaab rau khoom kws Vaajntxwv Daviv cov thawjcoj ntawm tej cuab kwvtij, cov numtswv kws saib pawg txheeb hab saib pawg pua, hab cov thawj tubrog tau coj tuaj fij pub rua Vaajtswv.
Puab muab tej khoom kws puab moog tua rog yeej hab txeeb tau huv tshaav rog lug coj moog fij rua huv tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev ca tau siv.

Selaumaus hab nwg tsev tuabneeg ua cov saib tej khoom kws muab fij tau siv rua huv tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev, hab tej kws thaus tug povthawj Xamuyees, Kises tug tub Xa-ules, Neles tug tub Aneles, hab Xeluyas tug tub Yau-am tub muab fij lawm.
Ixahales cov xeebntxwv: Khenaniyas hab nwg cov tub puavleej muab tsaa ua cov numtswv kws tuav ntaub ntawv hab tu plaub ntug rua cov pejxeem Yixalayees.

Henploos cov xeebntxwv: Haxanpiyas hab nwg cov kwvtij muaj ib txheeb xyaa pua leej, puavleej yog cov txivneej kws muaj peevxwm, hab tsaa puab ua cov tswjfwm cov Yixalayees kws nyob ntawm tug dlej Yauladees saab nubpoob hab ua num rua tug TSWV hab vaajntxwv.

Yeliyas yog tug thawjcoj ntawm Henploos cov xeebntxwv. (Thaus Daviv ua vaajntxwv tau plaub caug xyoo ntawd, txhaj tau tshawb nrhav Henploos cov xeebntxwv, hab pum tsev tuabneeg nuav tseem muaj cov ua tubrog kws sab tawv heev nyob huv lub nroog Yaxelas huv xeev Nkile-as.)

Vaajntxwv Daviv xaiv tau neeg nkaum xyaa txheeb leej kws muaj sab tawv heev ntawm Yeliyas tsev tuabneeg lug, hab tsaa puab ua cov saib taagnrho phaab kev ua ntaub ntawv ntawm saab kev ntseeg hab kev tswjfwm ntawm cov pejxeem Yixalayees kws nyob ntawm tug dlej Yauladees saab nubtuaj kws yog cov Lunpees, cov Khas hab ib nraab xeem Manaxes.

Ntawm nuav moog yog sau cov Yixalayees cov thawjcoj ntawm tej cuab kwvtij hab tej xeem hab puab cov thawjcoj kws ua num saib phaab ntaub ntawv rua lub tebchaws. Puab tau faib ua tej paab moog ua num, ib paab twg muaj neeg nkaum plaub txheeb leej, hab ib paab twg ua num ib xyoos twg ib hlis.
Xadiyees tug tub Yasaunpe-aas, ua tug saib paab ib ntawm lub ib hlis; nwg paab muaj neeg nkaum plaub txheeb leej.
Yasaunpe-aas yog Peles tug xeebntxwv, nwg ua tug saib cov thawj tubrog ntawm lub ib hlis.
Daudais kws yog Ahaus tug xeebntxwv, ua tug saib paab ob ntawm lub ob hlis (Mikhelaus  yog tug lwm thawj); nwg paab muaj neeg nkaum plaub txheeb leej.
Npeenayas ua tug saib paab peb ntawm lub peb hlis, nwg yog tug povthawj Yehauyadas tug tub; nwg paab muaj neeg nkaum plaub txheeb leej.
Npenayas yog ib tug kws ua tau heev ntawm peb caug leej, hab yog tug thawj ntawm peb caug leej ntawd; Npeenayas tug tub Amixanpas ua tug kws hloov nwg.
Yau-am tug kwv Axahees, ua tug saib paab plaub ntawm lub plaub hlis, hab nwg tug tub Xenpadiyas ua tug hloov nwg; nwg paab muaj neeg nkaum plaub txheeb leej.
Samehus ua tug saib paab tsib ntawm lub tsib hlis, nwg yog cov tuabneeg huv Ixelas; nwg paab muaj neeg nkaum plaub txheeb leej.
Ilas ua tug saib paab rau ntawm lub rau hli, nwg yog Ikes kws yog cov tuabneeg Tekau-as tug tub; nwg paab muaj neeg nkaum plaub txheeb leej.
Helej ua tug saib paab xyaa ntawm lub xyaa hli, nwg yog cov tuabneeg huv Peloos kws yog Efalayees cov xeebntxwv; nwg paab muaj neeg nkaum plaub txheeb leej.
Xinpekhais ua tug saib paab yim ntawm lub yim hli, nwg yog cov tuabneeg Husas, hab yog Xalas cuab kwvtij; nwg paab muaj neeg nkaum plaub txheeb leej.
Anpi-exes ua tug saib paab cuaj ntawm lub cuaj hli, nwg yog cov tuabneeg huv Anathaus, hab yog xeem Npeenyamees; nwg paab muaj neeg nkaum plaub txheeb leej.
Mahalais ua tug saib paab kaum ntawm lub kaum hli, nwg yog cov tuabneeg huv Netaufas, hab yog Xelas cuab kwvtij; nwg paab muaj neeg nkaum plaub txheeb leej.
Npenayas ua tug saib paab kaum ib ntawm lub kaum ib hlis, nwg yog cov tuabneeg huv Pilathoos, hab nwg yog xeem Efalayees; nwg paab muaj neeg nkaum plaub txheeb leej.
Heledais ua tug saib paab kaum ob ntawm lub kaum ob hlis, nwg yog tuabneeg huv Netaufas (Heedais yog Autheniyees cuab kwvtij); nwg paab muaj neeg nkaum plaub txheeb leej.

Ntawm nuav yog cov thawjcoj ntawm txhua xeem Yixalayees tej npe: Lunpees yog Xikhalis tug tub Eli-exes Xime-oos yog Ma-akas tug tub Sefatiyas Levis yog Kemuyees tug tub Hasanpiyas Aloos yog Xadaus Yudas yog Vajntxwv Daviv tug tijlaug hu ua Elihus Ixakhas yog Mikhayees tug tub Aumelis Xenpuloos yog Aunpadiyas tug tub Isemayas Nathalis yog Aliyees tug tub Yelemaus Efalayees yog Axaxiyas tug tub Hauseyas Manaxes Saab yog Pedayas tug Nubpoob tub Yau-ees Manaxes Saab yog Xakhaliyas tug Nubtuaj tub Idaus Npeenyamees yog Aneles tug tub Ya-axiyees Daas yog Yelauhaas tug tub Axalees

Vaajntxwv Daviv tsi suav tej tuabneeg kws noobnyoog qeg dlua neeg nkaum xyoo rov huv, rua qhov tug TSWV tub coglug tseg tas, nwg yuav pub cov Yixalayees fuamvaam coob ib yaam le tej nubqub sau nruab ntug.

Yau-am kws yog Xeluyas tug tub, pib sau cov Yixalayees tej npe, tabsis nwg sau tsi tau tav. Vaajtswv tub rau txim rua cov Yixalayees lawm, vim qhov kws sau npe nuav xwb, yog le ntawd thaus kawg txhaj tsi muaj suavdlawg tej npe txhij nyob rua huv Vaajntxwv Daviv cov numtswv tej ntaub ntawv khaws tseg.
Adiyees tug tub Axemaves, ua tug saib vaajntxwv tej txhaab rau khoom; Uxiyas tug tub Yaunathaas ua tug saib tej txhaab rau khoom peg tej zog, huv tej nroog hab huv tej chaw tsomfaaj;
Khelus tug tub Exelis ua tug saib cov tuabneeg ua teb;
Sime-is kws yog cov tuabneeg Lamas ua tug saib tej vaaj txiv maab; Xanpedis kws yog tuabneeg Sifamis ua tug saib tej chaw tsuam cawv txiv maab;
Npa-ahanaas kws yog tuabneeg Nkedes ua tug saib cov ntoo roj hab tej ntoo xikamaus huv Sefelas; Yau-as ua tug saib taagnrho tej txhaab rau roj txiv ntoo;
Sitalais kws yog tuabneeg Saloos ua tug saib tej tsaj kws tso rua huv lub taj Saloos; Adelais tug tub Safas ua tug saib tej tsaj kws tso rua huv tej haav;
Aunpis kws yog xeem Yisamayees ua tug saib cov ntxhuav; Yedeyas kws yog tuabneeg Melaunaus ua tug saib cov neeg luav; hab Yaxis kws yog tuabneeg Hankas ua tug saib tej yaaj hab tej tshis;
taagnrho cov numtswv nuav puavleej yog cov kws saib Vaajntxwv Daviv tej nyaj txag, tsaj txhu hab txhua yaam huv tuabsi.
Yaunathaas kws yog Daviv tug txiv ntxawm, yog ib tug tuavxaam kws muaj tswvyim hab txawj ntse heev. Yaunathaas hab Hasaunis tug tub Yehiyees ua xwbfwb qha ntawv rua vaajntxwv cov tub.
Ahitaufees yog vaajntxwv tug tuavxaam, hab Husais kws yog cov Akhis yog vaajntxwv tug phoojywg hab yog tug tuavxaam.
Tom qaab kws Ahitaufees tuag lawm, Anpiyathas hab Yehauyadas kws yog Npenayas tug tub ua tug tuavxaam hloov nwg chaw. Yau-am yog tug thawj tubrog.

Vaajntxwv Daviv has rua cov Yixalayees cov numtswv kuas moog sis sau rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees. Yog le ntawd, cov numtswv ntawm txhua xeem, cov numtswv kws tuav ntaub ntawv kws ua num rua lub tebchaws, cov thawjcoj ntawm txhua xeem, cov thawj saib tej khoom hab tej tsaj txhu kws yog vaajntxwv hab nwg cov tub tug, nrug cov numtswv huv lub loog, cov thawj tubrog, hab cov tuabneeg tseemceeb tuaj sis sau huv tuabsi rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.

Daviv lug sawv taabmeeg puab hab has tas: “Cov kwvtij, mej ca le noog kuv has. Kuv xaav ua ib lub tsev kws nyob moog le rau lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg hab ua tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv qhov chaw tag taw. Kuv tau npaaj txhua yaam tav taag, yuav ua ib lub Tuamtsev lug txhawb nqaa Vaajtswv,
tabsis Vaajtswv tsi pub kuv ua lub tuamtsev ntawd, vim kuv yog ib tug tubrog hab kuv tau tua tuabneeg coob leej ntau tug tuag lawm.

Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv, xaiv kuv hab kuv cov xeebntxwv ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yixalayees moog ibtxhis le. Vaajtswv yeej xaiv xeem Yudas lug ua cov thawjcoj hab xaiv kuv txiv tsev tuabneeg, kuv txiv cov tub, Vaajtswv txaus sab rua kuv hab tsaa kuv ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yixalayees.
Vaajtswv pub rua kuv muaj tub coob, taagnrho kuv cov tub, Vaajtswv tau xaiv Xalumoos lug ua tug kaav cov Yixalayees huv tug TSWV lub nroog.
“Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, ‘Koj tug tub Xalumoos yog tug kws yuav ua kuv lub Tuamtsev. Kuv tub xaiv nwg lug ua kuv tug tub lawm, hab kuv yuav yog nwg txiv.
Kuv yuav pub kuas nwg lub tebchaws nyob ruaj khov moog ibtxhis, yog nwg fwm hab coj lub neej lawv le kuv tej lug saamfwm hab tej kevcai kws nwg coj naj nub nua.’

“Yog le ntawd, cov Yixalayees kws yog tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg, kuv qha ntxiv rua mej taabmeeg tug TSWV hab mej suavdlawg kuas mej yuavtsum fwm hab ceev tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv tej lug kws tau saamfwm rua peb lawm, kuas mej txhaj yuav tau lub tebchaws aav zoo tshaaj plawg nuav lug ua mej tug, mej txhaj yuav tuav tau lub tebchaws nuav ca ua mej cov mivnyuas tug moog ibtxhis.”

Hab nwg has rua Xalumoos has tas, “Kuv tug tub, kuv qha ntxiv rua koj, koj yuavtsum paub koj txiv tug Vaajtswv hab ua nwg teg num kuas kawg koj lub sab hab tsi xob ua ob lub sab. Nwg paub txhua yaam kws peb xaav hab txhua yaam kws peb npaaj sab ua lawm. Yog koj moog cuag nwg, nwg yuav zoo sab txais yuav koj; tabsis yog koj tsiv tawm ntawm nwg, nwg yuav tso koj tseg moog ibtxhis le.
Koj yuavtsum paub has tas, tug TSWV tau xaiv koj kuas ua nwg lub Tuamtsev kws yog qhov chaw dlawbhuv. Nwgnuav koj ca le nqeg teg ua, hab muab lub sab xyivfaab hlo ua.”
Ces Daviv muab tug qauv kws yuav ua lub Tuamtsev, tej chaav rau khoom, tej chaav tsev txheej sau, chaav Dlawbhuv Kawg Nkaus kws yog qhov chaw zaam txim, cob huv tuabsi rua nwg tug tub Xalumoos,

hab nwg muab tug qauv kws nwg xaav tseg yuav ua lub tshaav puam hab tej chaav kws nyob puagncig tug TSWV lub tsev, tej txhaab kws rau Vaajtswv lub Tuamtsev tej cuabyeej, hab tej txhaab kws rau tej khoom kws luas coj tuaj fij pub rua tug TSWV rua Xalumoos;

Daviv tseem muab nwg tug qauv kws tsaa cov povthawj hab cov Levis lug tuav puab lub luag num, ua tej num huv tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev, hab saib txhua yaam khoom huv tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev lug cob rua Xalumoos.

Nwg qha kuas yuavtsum muab kub npaum le caag coj moog nchuav txhaj txaus ua tej khoom siv kws yog muab kub ua, hab muab nyaj npaum le caag coj moog nchuav txhaj txaus ua tej khoom siv kws yog muab nyaj ua.

Cov kub yog coj moog nchuav ua cov ncej txawb teeb hab cov teeb, cov kub puavleej coj moog ua cov ncej txawb teeb hab cov teeb kub, cov nyaj coj moog ua cov ncej txawb teeb hab cov teeb nyaj, lawv le tej teeb kws ua lug siv ntawd,
ua tej rooj nyaj hab tej rooj kub kws rau tej ncuav kws luas coj tuaj fij rua Vaajtswv,
hab Daviv qha kuas muab kub npaum le caag nchuav ua dlav rawg, taig phab hab khob; muab nyaj hab kub npaum le caag lug ua tej twj taig,
hab muab kub npaum le caag ua lub thaaj kws hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab hab ua lub tsheb rau ob tug qhelunpees kws nthuav tis npug rawv sau tug TSWV lub Phijxaab.
Vaajntxwv Daviv has tas, “Txhua yaam kws nyob huv dlaim qauv nuav yeej sau lawv le tej lug kws tug TSWV muab cob rua kuv lawm ntaag.”

Vaajntxwv Daviv has rua nwg tug tub Xalumoos has tas, “Koj ca le ua sab tawv qhawv tsi xob ntshai hab xyivfaab hlo. Pib ua num hab tsi xob pub ib yaam dlaabtsi taabkaum koj le. Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv tug kuv pehawm, nwg yuav paab koj. Nwg yuav tsi tso koj tseg, tabsis nwg yuav nrug koj moog txug thaus kws koj ua nwg lub Tuamtsev tav lawm.

Ca le muab cov povthawj hab cov Levis faib ua tej paab ua txhua teg num huv lub Tuamtsev. Cov txivneej kws txawj txhua yaam yuav zoo sab tuaj paab koj, cov pejxeem hab puab tej thawjcoj yuav noog koj lug.”

Vaajntxwv Daviv has rua cov pejxeem kws tuaj sis sau ua ke ntawd has tas: “Kuv tug tub Xalumoos yog ib tug kws Vaajtswv tau xaiv lawm, tabsis nwg tseem hluas hab tsi tau paub txhij txhua. Qhov kws yuav ua nuav yog teg num kws tseemceeb heev, rua qhov tsi yog ua lub loog rua tuabneeg nyob, tabsis yog ua lub tuamtsev rua tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv nyob.

Kuv muab sab siv zug npaaj txhua yaam khoom ua lub Tuamtsev: kub, nyaj, tooj, hlau, ntoo cab, hlaws, pobzeb muaj nqes, pobzeb xobna, pobzeb tawv hab ntau yaam pobzeb tseemceeb lug ua tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev.
Dlua le ntawd, kuv tseem muab ntau tshaaj ntawd lug ua lub Tuamtsev kws dlawbhuv, kuv tau muab tej nyaj tej kub kws yog kuv tug coj lug ntxiv rua, vim kuv hlub Vaajtswv lub Tuamtsev heev.
Kuv muab cov tseem kub yog ib puas kaum tsib taas hab cov tseem nyaj yog ob puas rau caum tsib taas coj lug ua tej saw dlai rua huv lub Tuamtsev tej phaab ntsaa

hab txhua yaam khoom siv yog cov tuabneeg nchuav nyaj nchuav kub ua, muab kub nchuav ua tej khoom siv kws yog kub, hab muaj nyaj nchuav ua tej khoom siv kws yog nyaj. Yog le ntawd, nub nuav puas muaj leejtwg muaj lub sab dlawb sab zoo xaav coj khoom tuaj fij rua tug TSWV lawm hab?”
Cov thawjcoj ntawm tej cuab kwvtij, cov numtswv ntawm tej xeem, cov thawj tubrog, hab cov tuav ntaub ntawv saib vaajntxwv tej khoom txhaj txaus sab hlo coj
tej khoom nuav tuaj ua lub Tuamtsev: ib puas cuaj caum taas kub, peb puas yim caum taas nyaj, rau pua xyaa caum tsib taas tooj hab peb txheeb xyaa pua tsib caug taas hlau.
Yog leejtwg muaj tej hlaws pobzeb muaj nqes ca le coj tej ntawd tuaj tso rua huv lub txhaab nyaj huv lub Tuamtsev, muab cob rua Nkesoos tug xeebntxwv Yehiyees kws yog xeem Levis ua tug saib.

Cov pejxeem txaus sab coj puab tej khoom tuaj pub rua tug TSWV ntawm lub sab dlawb paug, hab puab zoo sab qhov kws puab tau coj khoom ntau heev tuaj pub rua Vaajtswv. Hab Vaajntxwv Daviv los kuj zoo sab kawg le.

Vaajntxwv Daviv qhuas tug TSWV taabmeeg cov pejxeem suavdlawg kws tuaj sis sau ua ke ntawd. Nwg has tas, “Tug TSWV kws yog peb yawmkoob Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv, thov txhawb nqaa koj lub npe moog ibtxhis tsi kawg!

Tug TSWV, koj yog tug kws muaj zug nchaav, muaj fwjchim, muaj tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab, yog tug kws zoo kawg nkaus hab yog tug nyob moog ibtxhis. Txhua yaam kws nyob sau nruab ntug hab huv nplajteb nuav puavleej yog koj le, hab koj yog tug vaajntxwv kws kaav txhua tug huv tuabsi.
Kev muaj txag npluanuj hab lub koob meej puavleej yog koj pub; koj yog tug kaav txhua tsaav yaam lug ntawm koj lub fwjchim; hab koj yog tug muaj peevxwm muab koob meej hab fwjchim tau rua txhua tug.
Peb tug Vaajtswv, nwgnuav peb thov ua koj tsaug, peb thov txhawb nqaa hab qhuas koj lub npe kws muaj tshwjchim luj kawg nkaus.
“Kuv tsaav tuabneeg hab kuv yeej muab tsi tau ib yaam dlaabtsi pub rua koj le, rua qhov tej ntawd puavleej yog koj le, peb tsuas muab tej kws yog koj le rov rua koj xwb.

Tug TSWV, koj tub paub lawm has tas, peb yog tuabneeg thojnaam kws tsiv ib qho rua ib qho zoo le tej tuabneeg kws ua luas qhev hab zoo le tej tuabneeg txawv tebchaws, ib yaam le thaus peb cov yawmkoob tau ua lug lawm. Peb txujsa zoo le tug dluab ntxoov ntxoo kws dlua moog zuj zug, hab peb dlha tsi dlhau txujkev tuag le.
Tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv, taagnrho tej nyaj kws peb nqaa tuaj ua lub Tuamtsev kws yog qhov chaw pehawm koj lub npe kws dlawbhuv; tej nyaj txag nuav puavleej yog koj le xwb.

Kuv paub has tas, koj sim peb txhua tug lub sab hab koj txaus sab rua cov pejxeem kws muaj lub sab npuab koj. Kuv muaj lub sab dlawb sab zoo hab muab lub sab npuab koj, kuv txhaj zoo sab muab tej khoom nuav fij rua koj, kuv pum koj tsaav tuabneeg kws tuaj sis sau rua ntawm nuav puavleej zoo sab coj puab tej khoom tuaj rua koj huv tuabsi.
Tug TSWV kws yog peb yawmkoob Anplahaas, Ixaj hab Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv, thov koj ceev tej lug nuav rua huv koj tsaav tuabneeg lub sab moog ibtxhis, hab thov tswj kuas puab ua lub sab ncaaj rua koj.
Thov pub rua kuv tug tub Xalumoos muaj lub sab puv npo koj tej lug saamfwm, ua lawv le koj tej kevcai hab rau sab ntso muab tej kws kuv tub npaaj txhij nuav lawm ua kuas tau lub Tuamtsev.”

Daviv saamfwm rua cov pejxeem has tas, “Ca le qhuas tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv los mas!” Ces taagnrho cov pejxeem kws tuaj sis sau ua ke ntawd txhaj ua tug TSWV kws yog puab cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv tsaug, hab txhua tug nyo hau pehawm qhuas tug TSWV hab vaajntxwv.

Ces nub tom qaab ntawd puab txawm tua tsaj fij rua tug TSWV, hab muab tej tsaj ntawd faib rua cov pejxeem coj moog noj. Dlua le ntawd, puab tseem muab tau ib txheeb tug txiv nyuj, ib txheeb tug laug yaaj, hab ib txheeb tug mivnyuas yaaj lug tua fij ntxiv kws yog muab coj moog hlawv rua sau lub thaaj. Hab puab tseem coj tej cawv txiv maab tuaj fij rua Vaajtswv huv tuabsi.

Yog le ntawd, nub ntawd puab txhaj noj hab haus muaj kev zoo sab heev taabmeeg tug TSWV. Zag nuav yog zag ob kws puab tsaa Xalumoos ua Vaajntxwv kws yog muaj tug povthawj Xadaus ua puab tug thawjcoj, tuav tug TSWV lub npe txhawb meejthawj rua Xalumoos.
Ces Xalumoos tau ua vaajntxwv nyob sau lub zwmtxwv hloov nwg txiv Daviv chaw lawv le tug TSWV tau has tseg rua nwg lawm. Xalumoos tau ua vaajntxwv hab taagnrho lub tebchaws Yixalayees fwm nwg heev.
Taagnrho cov numtswv, cov tubrog hab Vaajntxwv Daviv cov tub puavleej coglug yuav ua ncaaj nceeg rua Vaajntxwv Xalumoos.
Ces tug TSWV ua kuas tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees paub fwm Xalumoos, hab Vaajtswv pub rua nwg muaj fwjchim luj dlua lwm tug vaajntxwv kws tau kaav tebchaws Yixalayees yaav taag lug lawm.
Yexais tug tub Daviv ua vaajntxwv kaav tsaav tebchaws Yixalayees
tau plaub caug xyoo. Nwg kaav nyob huv Henploos tau xyaa xyoo hab kaav nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees tau peb caug peb xyoo.
Daviv tuag thaus nwg laug heev lawm, nwg npluanuj, luas fwm nwg, hab nwg tug tub Xalumoos ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.

Zaaj kws has txug Vaajntxwv Daviv lub neej thaus pib lug txug thaus xaus puavleej muab sau ca rua huv Xamuyees tug kws cev Vaajtswv lug phoo ntawv, hab sau rua huv tug povthawj Nathaas phoo ntawv xwmtxheej hab muab sau rua huv Nkas tug kws cev Vaajtswv lug phoo ntawv,

Tej ntaub ntawv ntawd, qha txug Daviv kev tswjfwm zoo le caag, nwg muaj fwjchim npaum le caag hab taagnrho tej xwmtxheej kws tshwm rua nwg, rua lub tebchaws Yixalayees hab rua cov tebchaws kws nyob puagncig nwg lub tebchaws.
